summary: A down-and-out businessman travels to a seaside town, where he meets a woman with unusual sexual powers.
cast: Kôji Yakusho|Misa Shimizu|Mitsuko Baishô|Mansaku Fuwa|Isao Natsuyagi|Yukiya Kitamura|Hijiri Kojima|Toshie Negishi|Sumiko Sakamoto|Taka Guadalcanal|Mickey Curtis|Takao Yamada|Katsuo Nakamura|Kazuo Kitamura
title: Agua tibia bajo un puente rojo
